name: neon-dreams-theme
description: Beautiful developer themes with soft neon colors and pastel variants - optimized for all programming languages

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && npx vsce package --out dist/
scripts.build:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run build
scripts.build:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run build
scripts.build:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run build
scripts.release:patch: npm run build:patch && git add . && git commit -m "Release v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
scripts.release:minor: npm run build:minor && git add . && git commit -m "Release v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
scripts.release:major: npm run build:major && git add . && git commit -m "Release v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
